name: The fastest flinger in the west
name_original: The fastest flinger in the west
description:
Welcome to town, sheriff!

Sadly, i cannot be there as you arrive, so have this letter instead.

There is currently some budget cuts, so a revolver isn't available in the current state, but if you take a look on your right, there should be a rock sling, like the one David used to kill Goliath! You'll have to do with that for now. Oh, and there is a rock shortage too, so i'll make sure to increase your salary if you manage to keep rock usage down.

How to play:

Press the (x) button to start the game, and the (o) button to throw the rock. The more the enemies the rock hits in a row, the higher the score. Move with the arrow buttons(arrow keys on pc)

Please have a great time, and post your high score in the dedicated thread if you wish to.

Lexaloffle BBS thread
